nodes.text: The Z-Gomot Ternbuell Guppat Corporation was a vehicle manufacturing company that produced the TSMEU-6 personal wheel bike. The bike was popular in mining areas and was used by General Grievous on the planet Utapau during the Clone Wars.

Z-Gomot Ternbuell Guppat Corporation were first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends reference book Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections, which was written by Curtis Saxton and published in 2005. The company was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
